valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Thu 5 Feb 2026 to 06:00 (UTC) on Fri 6 Feb 2026
general_synopsis: Low 150 miles west of Sole 964 expected Sole 970 by midnight tonight

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 7 or gale 8 decreasing 4 to 6. In northeast, southeasterly 4 to 6 backing easterly 2 to 4.
Sea state
In southwest, very rough, becoming moderate or rough. in northeast, moderate or rough becoming slight or moderate.
Weather
In southwest, occasional sleet. In northeast, fair.
Visibility
Good, occasionally poor in southwest.

Gale warning
Issued:
15:48 (UTC) on Wed 4 Feb 2026
Southeasterly severe gale force 9 decreasing gale force 8 soon
